original_text: And Nadab and Abihu, the sons of Aaron, took either of them his censer, and put fire therein, and put incense thereon, and offered strange fire before the Lord, which he commanded them not.
korean_text: 아론의 아들 나답과 아비후가 각기 향로를 가져다가 여호와께서 명령하시지 아니하신 다른 불을 담아 여호와 앞에 분향하였더니

sentences.original_text: And Nadab and Abihu, the sons of Aaron,
took either of them his censer,
and offered strange fire before the Lord,

sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 그가 그들에게 명하지 않은 것이었다
